categoryUpdateSubtitle: Edit details of an existing category
categoryNewSubtitle: Create a category to track your expenses
locationUpdateSubtitle: Edit details of an existing location
locationNewSubtitle: Create a location to track your expenses
locationAddressText1: Type an address and press Enter on your keyboard.
locationAddressText2: If address is not found, map will not update.
locationAddressText3: If you want to remove the address, delete the text and press Enter on your keyboard.
name: Name (not necessary)
transactionUpdateSubtitle: Edit details of an existing expense
loginRegister: You want to register using email?
registerLogin: You want to login using email?
settingsNotificationsAndroidText: When notification service is enabled, Tro≈°ko will trigger when you receive a notification from banking apps.
settingsNotificationsiOSText: Due to limitations in the operating system, the notification service is not available on iOS devices.
settingsMapsText: Vector maps are higher quality, but graphically more complex to display.
settingsVoiceText: Press the button on the main screen and create expenses using your voice.
settingsIconsText: Category icons and all others used throughout the app.
settingsNameText: Here you can change the name of your user.
settingsNameText2: Type a new name and press Enter on your keyboard.
settingsRefreshDataText: Pressing this button will refresh your data.
settingsRefreshDataText2: Fetches everything from the remote database.
settingsLogoutText: Pressing this button will log you out.
settingsLogoutText2: You can use the app again by signing in.
settingsDeleteAccountText: Pressing this button will delete your account.
settingsDeleteAccountText2: This is non-reversible, think before you decide.
settingsDeleteAccountEmailModalText: To delete account, enter your email and password.
settingsCustomColorModalText: Pick a custom color for your category.
statsSubtitleCategory: Expenses per category for chosen month
statsSubtitleCategoryAll: Expenses per category for every month
statsSubtitleLocation: Expenses per location for chosen month
statsSubtitleLocationAll: Expenses per location for every month
errorGoogleUserMismatch: User is not the current user
entranceWaitGoogleToFinish: Please wait for Google sign-in to finish
entranceWaitAppleToFinish: Please wait for Apple sign-in to finish
voiceText1: Press the record button and speak in English about your expenses.
voiceText2: Imagine you're talking to a person, mention as much details as possible.
voiceText3: The idea is to be detailed so Tro≈°ko can create new expenses with as little additional help from you.
voiceText4: After finishing your speech, Tro≈°ko will create the expenses and ask for your assistance if anything is missing.
voiceSaveNewExpensesText1: Open relevant expense by long-pressing it, update and confirm it's details.
voiceSaveNewExpensesText2: When you're happy with the details, save each expense individually.
voiceSaveNewExpensesText3: You can delete an unwanted expense by dragging it or opening and pressing the delete button.
voiceSaveNewExpensesText4: When confirming or deleting an expense, it will dissapear from this list.
voiceNoExpensesSubtitle: Try again and mention more details
